title: Textile, "Fiddlehead", 1990
medium: Technique: screen printed discharge on plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp: 304cm (120in.). Weft:107cm (42in.). Both selvedges present.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 104cm (41 inches).
creditline: Museum purchase from Pauline Cooper Noyes and General Acquisitions Endowment Funds
description: Swirling circular shapes with tails, inspired by fern fiddleheads. Fucshia, orange and green on navy.
